snippet: David Wright and the Mets agreed to a new deal Friday, but now a struggling team that has been forced to downsize needs to find a way to build around him.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column questions what New York Mets third baseman David Wright gains by agreeing to an 8-year contract extension.
lead_paragraph: David Wright and the Mets agreed to a new deal Friday, but now a struggling team that has been forced to downsize needs to find a way to build around him.

headline.seo: David Wright Stays With Mets, for Better or Worse
headline.main: Wright Stays a Met, for Better or Worse
headline.print_headline: Wright Stays a Met, For Better or Worse
